sourcesContent:
import { Business, Product, Event, Discount, User } from '../types';

export const mockUser: User = {
  id: '1',
  name: 'Alex Johnson',
  email: 'alex@example.com',
  points: 1250,
  joinedDate: new Date('2024-01-15'),
};

export const mockBusinesses: Business[] = [
  {
    id: '1',
    name: 'The Local Roastery',
    description: 'Artisanal coffee shop with locally sourced beans and fresh pastries',
    category: 'Coffee & Tea',
    address: '123 Main St, Downtown',
    coordinates: { lat: 35.0844, lng: -106.6504 },
    rating: 4.8,
    reviewCount: 127,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1501339847302-ac426a4a7cbb?w=400',
    products: [],
    events: [],
    isVerified: true,
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    name: 'Crafted Goods',
    description: 'Handmade jewelry, pottery, and local art pieces',
    category: 'Arts & Crafts',
    address: '456 Central Ave, Arts District',
    coordinates: { lat: 35.0856, lng: -106.6512 },
    rating: 4.6,
    reviewCount: 89,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1513475382585-d06e58bcb0e0?w=400',
    products: [],
    events: [],
    isVerified: true,
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    name: 'Fresh Valley Farm Stand',
    description: 'Organic produce and farm-fresh goods from local farmers',
    category: 'Food & Grocery',
    address: '789 Garden Way, North Side',
    coordinates: { lat: 35.0892, lng: -106.6485 },
    rating: 4.9,
    reviewCount: 203,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1488459716781-31db52582fe9?w=400',
    products: [],
    events: [],
    isVerified: true,
  },
];

export const mockProducts: Product[] = [
  {
    id: '1',
    businessId: '1',
    name: 'House Blend Coffee',
    description: 'Our signature medium roast coffee blend',
    price: 12.99,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1447933601403-0c6688de566e?w=300',
    category: 'Coffee',
    inStock: true,
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    businessId: '1',
    name: 'Fresh Croissant',
    description: 'Buttery, flaky croissant baked fresh daily',
    price: 3.50,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555507036-ab794f0948c3?w=300',
    category: 'Pastry',
    inStock: true,
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    businessId: '2',
    name: 'Handwoven Scarf',
    description: 'Beautiful wool scarf made by local artisans',
    price: 45.00,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1601924994987-69e26d50dc26?w=300',
    category: 'Clothing',
    inStock: true,
  },
  {
    id: '4',
    businessId: '3',
    name: 'Organic Tomatoes',
    description: 'Fresh organic tomatoes grown locally',
    price: 4.99,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1546470427-e2686873673d?w=300',
    category: 'Produce',
    inStock: true,
  },
];

export const mockEvents: Event[] = [
  {
    id: '1',
    businessId: '1',
    title: 'Coffee Cupping Session',
    description: 'Learn about different coffee flavors and brewing techniques',
    date: new Date('2024-03-15T14:00:00'),
    endDate: new Date('2024-03-15T16:00:00'),
    location: 'The Local Roastery',
    coordinates: { lat: 35.0844, lng: -106.6504 },
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1497515114629-f71d768fd07c?w=400',
    attendeeCount: 12,
    maxAttendees: 20,
    category: 'Workshop',
    pointsReward: 50,
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    title: 'Downtown Art Walk',
    description: 'Monthly community art walk featuring local artists',
    date: new Date('2024-03-20T18:00:00'),
    endDate: new Date('2024-03-20T21:00:00'),
    location: 'Downtown Arts District',
    coordinates: { lat: 35.0856, lng: -106.6512 },
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1578662996442-48f60103fc96?w=400',
    attendeeCount: 45,
    category: 'Community',
    pointsReward: 25,
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    businessId: '3',
    title: 'Farm to Table Workshop',
    description: 'Learn about sustainable farming and cooking with seasonal produce',
    date: new Date('2024-03-25T10:00:00'),
    endDate: new Date('2024-03-25T13:00:00'),
    location: 'Fresh Valley Farm Stand',
    coordinates: { lat: 35.0892, lng: -106.6485 },
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1416879595882-3373a0480b5b?w=400',
    attendeeCount: 8,
    maxAttendees: 15,
    category: 'Workshop',
    pointsReward: 75,
  },
];

export const mockDiscounts: Discount[] = [
  {
    id: '1',
    businessId: '1',
    title: '20% Off Coffee Beans',
    description: 'Get 20% off any bag of coffee beans',
    discountPercentage: 20,
    pointsCost: 100,
    validUntil: new Date('2024-04-30'),
    maxRedemptions: 50,
    currentRedemptions: 12,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1447933601403-0c6688de566e?w=300',
    terms: 'Valid for retail bags only. Cannot be combined with other offers.',
  },
  {
    id: '2',
    businessId: '2',
    title: 'Free Gift Wrapping',
    description: 'Complimentary gift wrapping service',
    discountPercentage: 100,
    pointsCost: 50,
    validUntil: new Date('2024-05-15'),
    maxRedemptions: 100,
    currentRedemptions: 23,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1513475382585-d06e58bcb0e0?w=300',
    terms: 'Available for purchases over $25.',
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    businessId: '3',
    title: '15% Off Organic Produce',
    description: 'Save on fresh organic fruits and vegetables',
    discountPercentage: 15,
    pointsCost: 75,
    validUntil: new Date('2024-04-20'),
    maxRedemptions: 30,
    currentRedemptions: 7,
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1546470427-e2686873673d?w=300',
    terms: 'Valid on organic produce only. Minimum purchase $20.',
  },
];
